reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve read about Avène products for while, but this is my first purchase. I’m dealing with dry patches and redness right now and this was lightweight yet moisturizing and soothed my sensitive and irritated skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does not flare up my perioral dermatitis
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This product does not flare up my PD which is my top priority. I don’t notice a scent when I put it on. As you can see from the video, it takes a while to rub in and in general, I prefer more gel-like moisturizers but they often flare my skin up or irritate me. It feels a bit heavy but again, no skin flare ups and I don’t feel that it’s broken me out at all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is not a light moisturizer, but it definitely works!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this product as a moisturizer because its the only thing that actually works for my dry patches of skin and keeps my face moisturized throughout the day. It is not a light product and has a slightly oily feeling after application which goes away in a bout 30 minutes. It is non-comedogenic and was recommended to me by an esthetician and I've been using it for years. Only moisturizer that works for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smoothing and Soothing
reviews.reviewText: One of my favorite Avenue products. Makes my face feel smooth and healthy. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Used to be HG cream for me, but not enough moisture
reviews.reviewText: EDIT:I found that in winter, this cream wasn't moisturizing enough and my skin would start to dry up, itch, and cause me to start flaring up due to the dryness. I found that Paula's Choice Calm cream works better for me in this regard. So if you're pretty dry skinned, I'd skip this entirely.ORIGINAL REVIEW:I have rosacea and dry, highly sensitive skin. The only cream that my skin tolerates so far is the Tatcha Indigo cream, which is HELLA expensive. I was using the balm version of this but that didn't moisturize my skin enough and eventually the dryness was causing my skin to flare up. I use this cream in combination with the balm and I no longer need to search for creams. I am very happy with Avene, especially that it's much cheaper than Tatcha. I have used the cream by itself and feel that it would work fine for dry skin. If you want to "seal" it, use the balm. But I really feel that it would moisturize enough for any skin type.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ride or Die daytime moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: The best daytime moisturizer I have found, especially for the price. My makeup always goes on smooth over this and the style of pump bottle ensures you get everything out of the tube, unlike others that are impossible to get the last little bit out of. I’ve probably been using this for close to a year now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’ve been using this for years
reviews.reviewText: Recommended by my dermatologist. I like that it’s really light but also super moisturizing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My coworker recommended it to me when she saw my sensitive skin, she said her face getting better after used this one. The only thing is the price dropped about $8 after I just purchased it few days. If it will be adjusted will be more great to me.
After trying many other products for my sensitive skin this is by far the best I gave ever found. Well worth it. Thank you got your great products

Dopo aver provato davvero DI TUTTO Consiglio alle pelli più sensibili, quelle con sfoghi come pustole/brufoletti dati dai forti sbalzi termici, forte caldo o freddo o vento.Perfetta anche in caso di irritazione data da altri prodotti per il viso. Ne basta un velo mattina e sera e si assorbe velocemente senza lasciare la pelle unta, che invece è pronta a qualsiasi base trucco. Ottimo applicatore che preserva il prodotto dai batteri e a tubetto finito pochissimo la crema residua ( a differenza di altri tanti tubi che in molti casi nemmeno si aprono con le forbici).Usato mattina e sera in combinazione con Cicalfate (texture più densa e corposa) tuttora mi salva la pelle.

reviews.reviewTitle: Tolle Creme und vielen Dank an den Hersteller!
reviews.reviewText: Meine Gesichtshaut ist sehr empfindlich und ich habe immer wieder Ekzeme unter den Augen, was sehr unangenehm ist und für Unbehagen im ganzen Gesicht sorgt.Zum Glück habe ich diese Creme entdeckt und sie hilft mir sehr.Die trockenen, geröteten und schuppigen Stellen sind verschwunden und ich habe nach dem Auftragen ein angenehmes Gefühl. Kein brennen und jucken mehr.Ich benutze sie im Moment allein als Gesichtscreme und auch als Ersatz für eine Augencreme, was sehr gut funktioniert.Ich werde auf jeden Fall nach so langer Suche nur noch diese Creme verwenden, denn wie heißt es so schön: Never change a running system!Wenn man empfindliche und zu Rötungen neigende Haut im Gesicht hat, muss man einfach diese Creme verwenden.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this all the time, no stinging or tingling.

La mejor crema hidratante si tienes piel atópica y/o sensible. Está es la fórmula que sustituye a avene intolerance.Mi número uno...siempre uso y tengo esta crema para mí rutina diaria desde hace años, la puedes utilizar hasta para el contorno de ojos si quieres. Top total. Jamás he visto mi piel mal con esta crema y la tengo muy delicada. Tras la aplicación, se absorbe perfectamente y no deja sensación de grasa ni pesadez.No tiene tratamiento antiarrugas, etc, que debes completar, si es tu caso.
